short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension set password on websites for you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Browser extension that allows you to put a password on any site.

You can restrict access to sites for your child, or anyone else.

Browser support:

Features: Delete / edit / disable any site in the settings

When you enter the site where the password is set, a modal window with the password will be displayed, if you successfully enter the password, you are allowed to the site, otherwise they will not be allowed
